name: 22 Heavy Arrivals on Runway 24R at YUL
description:
In July last year, I spent 3 fantastic days in Montreal for some plane spotting at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, and managed to capture over 20 heavies landing on runway 24R, YUL's main arrival runway. Despite having only a million more passengers than my home airport of Calgary, the traffic at YUL is incredibly diverse! Montreal being the headquarters of both Air Transat and Air Canada, there's a lot of each carrier in this 20 minute compilation, but also the majority of YUL's European carriers, including the gorgeous Royal Air Maroc 747-400! Enjoy.

And a very special thank you to CYUL Plane Spotter and YQBSpotting for a fantastic time spotting that day! Go check them out here:
https://www.youtube.com/CYULPlaneSpotter
https://www.youtube.com/YQBSpotting

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO

#2: Air China 777-300ER B-2037 - PEK-YUL
#3: Air Canada A330-300 C-GFUR - GVA-YUL
#4: Air Canada Rouge 767-300ER(WL) C-FIYE - VCE-YUL
#5: Air Transat A330-200 C-GTSJ - MRS-YUL
#6: Air Canada Rouge 767-300ER(WL) C-GHPN - BCN-YUL

#9: Air France 787-9 Dreamliner F-HRBA - CDG-YUL
#10: Air Transat A330-300 C-GTSD - NTE-YUL

#12: Lufthansa A340-300 D-AIFA - FRA-YUL
#13: Air Canada 777-300ER C-FNNU - LHR-YUL
#14: Air Algerie A330-200 7T-VJV - ALG-YUL
#15: Air Transat A310-300 C-GTSH - CUN-YUL
#16: Air Canada A330-300 C-GHLM - LYS-YUL
#17: KLM A330-200 PH-AON - AMS-YUL

#21: Air Canada Rouge 767-300ER C-FMWV - PAP-YUL
#22: Royal Air Maroc 747-400 CN-RGA - CMN-YUL
